subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The riders in the Giro d’Italia, led by Wednesday’s stage winner Denis Menchov, are tackling early climbs in a race that its new director wants to jazz up and turn into a rival to the Tour de France.
snippet: The riders in the Giro d’Italia, led by Wednesday’s stage winner Denis Menchov, are tackling early climbs in a race that its new director wants to jazz up and turn into a rival to the Tour de France.
